title: The carpet areas of the tenements to be constructed under the concept of “AH” shall be for EWS, LIG MIG, or as decided by Govt
clause_text: The carpet areas of the tenements to be constructed under the concept of “AH” shall be for EWS, LIG MIG, or as decided by Govt. from time to time subject to a minimum 25 sq. m. Development of other types of tenements shall not be permissible under this Regulation.
